ComicInfo.Summary: Mighty Man, Barbaric and Ricochet meet with a councilman about the damages caused by their evil doubles. During the meeting the floor turns into living matter and attacks Ricochet after a brief tussle the floor returns to normal. Superpatriot is fighting a group of freaks known as the Fantastical Force Mighty Man joins the fight and the Fantastical Four are quickly defeated. But it turns out that the group was only a warm up for the real threat a freak known as Absorbing Junior.
